description: Single storey rear extension, two storey side extension; roof extension to rear (main) roof slope
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings: PL01 Location Plan, PL02 Site Plan, PL03 Existing Front and Rear Elevations, PL04 Existing Side Elevations, PL05 Existing Floor and Roof Plans, PL06 Rev A Proposed Front and Rear Elevations, PL07 Rev A Proposed Side Elevations, PL08 Rev A Proposed Floor and Roof Plans.

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application form and the plans as listed in Condition (2).

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B, 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1, 1.2, 2.1 and 2.10, policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the Cuckoo Estate Conservation Area Management Plan. | The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

REASON: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), D6 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and Cuckoo Estate Conservation Area Management Plan.
